description: Thousands of people march in the Bosnian capital Sarajevo against a service to remember Nazi-allied Croatian soldiers.
title: Bosnia: Protesters condemn Mass for WWII Croat Nazi collaborators
title_page: Bosnia: Protesters condemn Mass for WWII Croat Nazi collaborators - BBC News
maintext: A similar memorial event was held in Croatia's capital Zagreb. Tens of thousands of Nazi-allied Croatian soldiers and their families fled to Austria at the end of World War Two. But British forces handed them over to Yugoslav partisans, who killed many of them at Bleiburg and on a forced march back to Yugoslavia.
